title: PDF to Podcast Converter (PDFcast)
description: Developed a website that converts PDF documents into podcasts with 2 AI hosts discussing the content. Used open-source LLMs and text-to-speech models via Groq Cloud APIs. Implemented intelligent text chunking, PDF parsing, audio generation, and API rate limit handling. Deployed globally at zero running costs.
techUsed: Python, JavaScript, Node.js, LLMs, NLP, Text-to-Speech, Full-Stack

title: Domino's Pizza Brand Strategy Case Study
description: NYU Stern Marketing Course project analyzing Domino's brand and marketing strategies. Showcased how the company leveraged innovative approaches and effective branding to become a global leader in pizza delivery and a dominant player in the fast-food industry.
techUsed: Marketing Analytics, Brand Strategy, Case Study Research

title: Cadillac CLCMRC Website Enhancement
description: Contract-based project: Built a chatbot using Google Flan-T5 and ChromaDB handling 500+ daily queries. Developed a ResNet18 CNN model trained on 60K+ car images for image-to-text predictions in under 2 seconds. Deployed on AWS (EC2, S3, EFS), reducing model training time by 50%.
techUsed: LLMs, CNN, TensorFlow, Django, AWS, ChromaDB, Computer Vision

title: Financial Advisor LLM System
description: Built an AI-powered financial advisor using GPT-4 and open-source LLMs for real-time personalized financial advice. Integrated large-scale financial databases, implemented training pipelines, and created streaming pipelines for live financial news integration. Deployed with efficient inference for quick real-time responses.

title: Image Dehazing Using Deep Learning
description: Research project: Built a novel methodology for dehazing single outdoor images using feature extraction techniques in Deep Learning with 3 added pre-processing steps. Achieved highest novel accuracy (high PSNR and SSIM values). Published in IEEE and presented at ICECONF-2023 Conference.
techUsed: TensorFlow, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Research

title: COVID-19 Cases Analysis of India
description: Procured India-wide COVID-19 data from data.gov.in. Pre-processed CSV files using Python libraries, then analyzed and visualized the refined data to derive various inferences about the pandemic's spread across India.
techUsed: Python, Pandas, Data Visualization, Data Analysis

title: Online Blood Bank Management System
description: Built an online blood bank management system to manage various blood bank operations effectively. Features a central repository for blood deposits with details. Simulates Blood Banks by keeping records of blood donors, depositories, and blood recipients.
